subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The rule change is a shift from the past where players had to declare for the draft before the N.B.A. combine and in doing so renounce future college eligibility.
snippet: The rule change is a shift from the past where players had to declare for the draft before the N.B.A. combine and in doing so renounce future college eligibility.
